mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d') bet_time,COUNT(1) bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.net_amount) winlose, SUM(d.valid_bet_amount) validamount FROM ds_ag_sport d
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(d.bet_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT (case when COUNT(1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 2400 END ) AS game_type, (case when COUNT(1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 'AG体育' END ) AS game_name, (case when COUNT(1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(1) END ) AS bet_count, SUM(d.bet_amount) betamount, SUM(d.net_amount) winlose, SUM(d.valid_bet_amount) validamount FROM ds_ag_sport d
select count(1) as bet_count,sum(bet_amount) as betamount,sum(valid_bet_amount) as validamount,sum(net_amount) as winlose from ds_ag_sport
mapper.sql: id, site_id, user_pre, username, player_name, bill_no, agent_code, game_code, net_amount, win_loss_type, game_kind, game_kind_name, game_type, game_type_name, bet_amount, bet_time, valid_bet_amount, flag, currency, login_ip, recalcu_time, platform_id, platform_type, device_type, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from ds_ag_sport
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from ds_ag_sport
order by ${orderByClause}
